result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Ashland County Clerk of Circuit Court

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robert Samuel Powless

records.addlTxt: ( OFF the Record at 8:45am -- The judge released the jury)   8:48 AM Defendant Robert Samuel Powless not in court.  Attorney Lynne K Van Hollen in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman in court for Robert Samuel Powless.  Back on the record -- Atty still has not heard from the def. Ct released the juror. Ct lifts the stay and the warrant and bond forf is ordered. State comments on Ex that have been marked. Ct views them as part of the court file. Will leave them be at this point.

8:06 AM Defendant Robert Samuel Powless not in court.  Attorney Lynne K Van Hollen in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman in court for Robert Samuel Powless. 20CF61,  22CF80 and 20CF10. 20CF61 is schd for a JT today, 22CF80 is schd for a INIT and 20CF10 is a STC. Def was last in Court June 13th. Was advised to appear in person today at 8am. Jurors are arriving and the def is not here. Yesterday at 3pm the def did not show up to the motion in Limine hearing. Atty does not know where the def is at. Ct will issues warrants and stay them until 9am.
Ct orders-- Body only warrant, bond forf will send notice and if no response in 30 days judgement will enter. Stayed until 9am today.

3:03PM Prosecuting attorney Lynne K Van Hollen appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Robert Samuel Powless not in court.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman appeared by video for Robert Samuel Powless.  20CF10,20CF61-- Atty comments- was planning on the def appearing for the hearing today. Ct comments- Hearing was schd without the def being present, Atty comments spoke with the def on Friday. Back on the record: 3:09pm- Atty could not reach the def. Ct is concerned if the def will show up tomorrow. Ct will not issue a warrant based on failure to appear for today. State comments on the def failure to appear. State is asking for the trial to proceed. Atty will be happy to make update by email later today. IF atty hears anything before the end of the day today, she can let us know. Parties appear at 8am, and pretrial motions can be heard in the small Ct room.
mailed amended bond to the def with a self addressed stamped envelope to have him sign and return with the proper conditions listed.

ADDRESS INFO for Robert Samuel Powless
Current: Po Box 262, Odanah, WI 54861 United States  (Effective: 06-16-2022)
Prior: 77767 Sandpit Road, Saxon, WI 54559
ACJ payment receipt, Bail Bond Info Sheet from ACJ, Notice RE Posting Bond form and a copy of signed cash bond
Adjourned initial appearance on June 28, 2022 at 08:00 am.

01:41 PM Defendant Robert Samuel Powless in court with attorney Michelle M Erdman.  Lynne K Van Hollen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   COVID - ZOOM; all parties agree to appear via ZOOM today.  20CF10,20CF61,22CF80-- final STC before a JT in July, 20CF61 is #1 trial. Atty comments-- working with the State, needs to talk with the def. Back on the record- 1:53pm--  Atty comments-- the cases schd for trail will go forward.. 20CF61 #1 trial. parties need to be present in the Ct room for motion in limines. 
22CF80-- Def needs to talk with SPD on getting an atty on this case. Def needs to contact SPD ASAP to get an atty. 
AIA 6/28/22 at 8am
